alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 05 at 3:12PM CDT until April 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, sustained northwest winds 30 to 45 MPH with gusts as high as 55 to 65 MPH expected. For the High Wind Watch, very similar northwest winds sustained at 30 to 45 mph with gusts as high as 55 to 65 MPH possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 10 AM to 8 PM CDT Wednesday. For the High Wind Watch, from Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...At least patchy blowing dust and minor visibility restrictions will be possible during the high winds. Localized areas of significant blowing dust are possible, particularly south and southwest of the Tri Cities.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
